titleStmt.title: A sermon preacht in Madrid, July 4, 1666. s.n. occasioned by the sad and much lamented death of his late Excellency Sir Richard Fanshaw Knight and Baronet ... / by Henry Bagshaw.
titleStmt.author: Bagshaw, Henry, 1632-1709.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for G. Beadle and T. Collins, and are to be sold at their shop ...,
